comment: She is an awful professor. Well, her personality is not that bad after used to. Cal 2 tests are REALLY EXTREMELY hard. She said all the exams and quizzes are from examples previous class and it is not hard....who believes? Unless, learned or know well about materials in Cal 2 NEVER EVER take this odd person's lecture.

She's a great teacher who knows her stuff, and makes a concerted effort to try and get you to see applications that will help you understand the material better. One MAJOR drawback is that her tests are brutal hard IMO. She does draw some from the text book so study that an you should be ok. (don't be lazy like me.)

Easy A. Has accent but understandable! She has a "Wake up conversation" prior to beginning lecture. She's  Funny, make jokes, tells you about her home country- Peru! Makes Calc interesting. Attendance not mandatory. 3 tests -7 easy quizzes! All questions for test and quizzes come from textbook. If you PRACTICE the problems, you'll do great!

Senora Flor is AWESOME! If you go to class, you will get an A. Attendance not mandatory but best way to get Easy A. Tests ? are reviewed in very similar format prior to the test. She extends several extra credit assignments. She's loves her students and Calculus. Go to her office hrs, she's there and willing to answer any ?s. Best Math Professor!

Dr. Flower is a very nice lady BUT nice doesn't get you a passing grade, all of her work is from the book, you have 3 test and some quizzes and no cushion if you fail anything. Her test are handwritten and extremely difficult. Time between test was rushed. I dropped this class.

Dr. Flower (she says if you can't pronounce her name, or like flowers, to call her Dr. Flower. lol) is a tough teacher. She loves calculus and teaches well, but her tests are extremely difficult to make a good grade on. Study the practice problems in the book!! She will help whoever asks for it. Very nice lady. Go to class or you will be very lost!
